text: Thanks Jon. I was just looking for demo site links for each theme to be shared with clients who may prefer customizing a default theme vs build a new one from scratch.

Quick naked domain redirect to www. in azure question. With AWS you pass your @ as an a-record through a proxy and and it runs an auto re-route through their systems after providing a ip addy and points back to the www.  ----

For azure are we needing to point the a-record for the naked domain to a particular IP address that is given somewhere?
Is there a reason anyone can think of that all the css for my site seems to have disconnected?

Can we get some more documentation on the `visibility` property for custom modules?
Currently the docs just state:
> visibility | Array | Determines the display conditions for a field.
It’d be nice to have the `controlling_field`, `controlling_value_regex`, `operator`(I can never remember the options to the operator key), `access`, and `hidden_subfields` added to the docs

also <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/module-theme-fields#font|font fields> need some doc love too. For example, what are the options for `font_set`? What are the options for `styles` ?

Hi, I am not sure where to put this. I want a section of my HubSpot site to use a different navigation than the rest of the site. I made the menu for it and the new page(s) that will use this new navigation menu, but I do not want to override the global "default" menu. Is this possible to do in HubSpot?

yes it is possible, you have to modify the template. It’s hard to tell you the correct answer without knowing more about your template set up.

You will most likely have to modify the template or module

Okay i'll start there. I'm using the CLI and just reverse engineering the template from our main site. Sorta confusing but thank you. I thought it had something to do with the website setting gear icon (in which I did make a submenu for)

I have a client that has a HubSpot portal integrated with salesforce. And I am creating some custom modules for them using HubSpot forms.

They are telling me that there should be a sfdc_variable in the HubSpot form ...

Does anyone have any experience with this??? Is there something I need to do in the module level to enable this???
